article.title: Interactive Reference Retrieval in Large Files
article.author: Carville, M.Higgins, L. D.Smith, Francis J.
article.text: We express the conviction that on-line reference retrieval will largely replace the present tape driven system in a few years.. We describe the design criteria of such an on-line system based on our experience of a pilot system which has been operational for 2 years, emphasizing the importance of minimizing the number of disk accesses.. We recommend the use of hash coding for searching in a thesaurus and point out that the user of an on-line system should use the most precise terms first and the common terms last - the opposite of the procedure in a manual search..
